attributes.action: Make it a rule for M.P.s to refund profits from the sale of second homes to taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should refund all profits, from the sale of second homes, to the taxpayers.After all, they have been purchased indirectly by the public.

rejection.details: MPS' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
